name: 3Rivers
0:
”Alexa open 3Rivers”
”Alexa, ask 3Rivers to list my accounts”
”Alexa, ask 3Rivers for routing number”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: three rivers
Developer Terms of Use
des: 3Rivers banking assistant is a free virtual financial assistant where our members can engage with their 3Rivers accounts 365/24/7. Members can receive account balances, transfer money to an account and pay loans, find the nearest location and ATM, and ask FAQs. Please note your financial information will be read aloud and/or displayed visually, so as an extra layer of security you will create a 4-digit voice PIN.
